.. DataQA documentation master file, created by
   sphinx-quickstart on Mon May  6 15:03:43 2019.
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to DataQA's documentation!
##################################

Documentation of the DataQA package which contains functionality to perform
quality assessment of Apertif imaging survey data processed by Apercal (`Github link <https://github.com/apertif/apercal>`_)

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   pipeline
   report
   osa
   prepare
   preflag
   crosscal
   continuum
   selfcal
   line
   miscellaneous
